original_text: Therefore, thou son of man, prepare thee stuff for removing, and remove by day in their sight; and thou shalt remove from thy place to another place in their sight: it may be they will consider, though they be a rebellious house.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 포로의 행장을 꾸리고 낮에 그들의 목전에서 끌려가라 네가 네 처소를 다른 곳으로 옮기는 것을 그들이 보면 비록 반역하는 족속이라도 혹 생각이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: and remove by day in their sight
and thou shalt remove from thy place
to another place in their sight
it may be they will consider
though they be a rebellious house
